author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Scotland. Sovereign (1619-1685 : Charles II)
publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, Printer to his most sacred Majesty,
notes: Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
Dated at end: Given under Our Signet at Edinburgh, the eight day of April, one thousand six hundred eighty and one, and of Our Reign, the thretty three year.
Signed: Wil. Paterson, Cl. Sti. Concilii.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
